proposal: Understanding the value of privacy and user empowerment, 0xSearch revolutionizes web searches with a 'search-to-earn' model, rewarding users with $SEARCH tokens. Congrats on reaching 531 holders on the ETH network! Imagine integrating our DEX or Lottery tools, allowing your community to deploy and further benefit from the ecosystem you're building. Together, we can enhance the rewarding experience of 0xSearch, making every search not just private, but also potentially more profitable.
